long_description: With 24 efficient gears for hills and flats and a comfortable rider position, the Raleigh Misceo 2.0 urban bike lets you wind your way through city streets with confidence. Butted aluminum frame features a formed down tube and is designed for comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position for great visibility. Shimano crankset and front and rear derailleurs provide easy pedaling and shifting through all 24 speeds; bike is geared for hills as well as flats. Tektro Novela disc brakes provide smooth, responsive deceleration and easy speed management. 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda K-192 tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets alike. Convenient platform pedals accept most casual shoes. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). The Raleigh Misceo 2.0 Bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: With 24 efficient gears for hills and flats and a comfortable rider position, the Raleigh Misceo 2.0 urban bike lets you wind your way through city streets with confidence.
